duties_responsibilities.duty: Encourage open-ended exploration, tinkering, and discovery for youth in technology and STEM fields.
Ensure youth voice leads project planning and implementation.
Plan and execute technology/STEM activities during afterschool and summer hours.
Participate in national programs and trainings related to technology and STEM.
Support marketing efforts with media and community outreach for special events.
Provide guidance and role modeling to members and implement formal and informal homework assistance and tutoring programs.
Plan and oversee participation in industry events and community outreach to involve a diverse group of young people, parents, teachers, and community leaders.
Recruit, train, and support volunteer mentors, ensuring they work effectively with youth.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in an applicable field (such as IT, technology education, STEM) or a combination of education and at least 1-2 years of experience in a similar position.
